title: Gamification-Based Blockchain Education: Social Studies Instructional Design Using Card Games

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Computer Science Concepts and Pedagogical Knowledge
context.additional_context: A training program for pre-service/in-service teachers to apply blockchain core concepts to card game design, enabling effective delivery to elementary students

learning_goals: Acquiring instructional design skills to transform core blockchain technologies (hash functions, consensus algorithms, distributed ledger) into card game mechanics
Developing learning motivation strategies using gamification elements (reward design, exploration-exploitation balance)
Cultivating the ability to develop educational models through MDA framework application and project-based assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
